text: Rita Nwadike (born 3 November 1974) is a Nigerian former football midfielder. Nwadike played for the Nigeria women's national football team at the 2004 Summer Olympics. She played for the Rivers Angels club. She scored Nigeria's first ever FIFA Women's World Cup goal in the 1995 tournament in Sweden. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Footballers at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1995 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1999 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Rita Nwadike
